name: InventoryUnitHw
description: IM Inventory Unit Hardware resource function specification

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: id
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Used as an RDN when naming an instance of the object class.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: hwId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Hardware identifier allocated by the vendor

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: hwType
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Type of the HW unit (e.g. equipment holder, carriage)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: hwName
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Mnemonic of hardware inventory unit family type (e.g. Fan, PSU) assigned by vendor

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: hwVersion
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Version of current unit (e.g. firmware version)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: salesUniqueId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Date of Manufacture of inventory unit

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: hwUnitLocation
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Unique physical or logical location identifier within NE

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: manualDataEntry
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Indicates whether unit is passive or active

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: nEList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Carries the set of DN(s) of related InventoryUnitNE(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: sWList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Carries the set of DN(s) of related InventoryUnitSw(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: lICList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Carries the set of DN(s) of related InventoryUnitLic(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: mFunction
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Carries the DN of related ManagedFunction
